company.name: First Response Tree Service
company.tagline: Professional Tree Care You Can Trust
company.description: Expert tree removal, pruning, and emergency services for residential and commercial properties.

hero.title: Professional Tree Services
hero.subtitle: Expert tree care for your property's safety and beauty

services.title: Tree Removal
services.description: Safe and efficient tree removal services for hazardous or unwanted trees.

services.title: Tree Pruning & Trimming
services.description: Professional pruning to maintain tree health and enhance your landscape.

services.title: 24/7 Emergency Service
services.description: Quick response for storm damage and emergency tree situations.

services.title: Stump Grinding
services.description: Complete stump removal to restore your landscape's beauty.

about.title: About First Response Tree Service
about.content: With over 15 years of experience in professional tree care, we provide reliable, safe, and expert tree services. Our certified arborists are committed to maintaining the health and beauty of your trees while ensuring the safety of your property.

testimonials.name: Sarah Johnson
testimonials.text: First Response Tree Service did an amazing job removing a large oak tree from our backyard. Professional, efficient, and reasonably priced!

testimonials.name: Mike Rodriguez
testimonials.text: Called them for emergency storm cleanup. They were there within an hour and had everything cleared quickly. Highly recommend!

testimonials.name: Jennifer Davis
testimonials.text: Excellent tree trimming service. Our trees look fantastic and the cleanup was thorough. Will definitely use again.

gallery.title: Our Work
gallery.description: See examples of our professional tree services in action

contact.title: Get Your Free Estimate
contact.description: Contact us today for professional tree services. We provide free estimates and emergency response.

seo.title: First Response Tree Service - Professional Tree Care
seo.description: Expert tree removal, pruning, and emergency services. Licensed, insured, and available 24/7 for all your tree care needs.
seo.keywords: tree service, tree removal, tree pruning, stump grinding, emergency tree service
